name: VibeVoice-Large Serverless
description: Microsoft VibeVoice-Large (9.34B params) - Frontier Text-to-Speech Model with up to 4 speakers and 45min generation
readme:
# VibeVoice-Large Serverless

Deploy Microsoft's frontier VibeVoice-Large model (9.34B parameters) as a serverless endpoint.

## Features
- üéôÔ∏è Up to 4 speakers
- ‚è±Ô∏è Up to 45 minutes generation
- üåç English & Chinese support
- üí∞ Pay-per-use serverless
- ‚ö° Auto-scaling to zero

## Usage

```python
import requests

response = requests.post(
    'https://api.runpod.ai/v2/{ENDPOINT_ID}/runsync',
    headers={'Authorization': 'Bearer {API_KEY}'},
    json={
        'input': {
            'text': 'Speaker 1: Hello! Speaker 2: Hi there!',
            'speaker_names': ['Alice', 'Bob']
        }
    }
)

result = response.json()
```

## Model Info
- Model: aoi-ot/VibeVoice-Large
- Parameters: 9.34B
- Languages: English, Chinese
- Max Context: 32K tokens
- Research use only
